responsibilities: Work with top applied AI researchers to advance trustworthy GenAI development.
Generate and communicate innovative ideas to enhance the product for AI developers.
Collaborate with engineering and product management to understand AI developers' use cases and build unique features.
Read and research the latest LLM evaluation literature and apply findings to Galileo's product offerings.
Work with Platform Engineering and Frontend teams to ensure efficient computation times and robust AI algorithm delivery.
qualifications: Strong experience with Pytorch, TensorFlow, Keras, or other Deep Learning frameworks.
Strong experience with Generative or Seq-2-Seq Models.
Strong understanding of advanced evaluation techniques in Machine Learning.
Strong Python programming skills, capable of writing efficient, clean, and scalable code.
Strong communication skills with the ability to understand complex technical concepts.
Strong ML problem-solving skills with the ability to conduct independent experiments.
analysis:
The job responsibilities and skills clearly indicate involvement with Generative AI (GenAI) and language models (LLMs). The responsibilities mention working with top applied AI researchers to advance trustworthy GenAI development, which directly points to Generative AI. Additionally, the task of reading and researching the latest LLM evaluation literature and applying findings to product offerings explicitly involves language models.

The skills required for the job further support this conclusion. The need for strong experience with Generative or Seq-2-Seq Models indicates a focus on generative models, which are a subset of GenAI. The requirement for strong experience with deep learning frameworks like Pytorch, TensorFlow, and Keras, which are commonly used for developing and training language models, also suggests work with LLMs. The emphasis on advanced evaluation techniques in machine learning and strong ML problem-solving skills aligns with the development and evaluation of language models.

Overall, both the responsibilities and skills strongly suggest that the job involves working with Generative AI and language models.
